<xen:textboxunit label="{xen:phrase xendevtools_xenforo_username}:" name="xenforo_username" value="{$xenOptions.xendevCustUsername}" /> <xen:passwordunit label="{xen:phrase xendevtools_xenforo_password}:" name="xenforo_password" value="{$xenOptions.xendevCustPassword}" hint="{xen:phrase xendevtools_customer_area_not_forum}" />
<xen:textboxunit label="{xen:phrase xendevtools_xenforo_license_key}:" name="xenforo_license" value="{$xenOptions.xendevCustLicense}" />
<xen:checkboxunit label=""> <xen:option name="save_license" selected="true">{xen:phrase xendevtools_save_update_credentials}</xen:option>
<xen:option name="unsupported" selected="true">{xen:phrase xendevtools_upgrade_to_latest_unsupported_release}</xen:option> </xen:checkboxunit>
<xen:if is="{$loadUpgradeOverlay}"> <script> this.$trigger = { href : '{xen:adminlink add-ons/upgrade-pending }' }; this.$options = {};
this.OverlayLoader = new XenForo.OverlayLoader($(this.$trigger), false, this.$options); this.OverlayLoader.load(); </script> </xen:if>

{xen:phrase xendevtools_upgrade_xenforo_version}: {$downloadDetails.version_string}

{xen:phrase xendevtools_confirm_upgrade_to_following_version}:

{$downloadDetails.version_string}
{xen:phrase cancel}

modification.description: Adds a build link to each list item
modification.replace: $0 {xen:phrase build}...

modification.description: Adds the AdvancedTextArea class to textareas in the Template Modification Edit screen.
Adds data attribute to the TM list item
Adds data attribute to the listener list item
Adds various JS to the PAGE_CONTAINER so it can be used anywhere.
Adds the top choosers to the phrase list
Removes the filter controls from the phrase list on certain pages.

listener.description: Extends the XenForo content type model. Hint: XenForo_Model_ContentType

phrases.phrase: Add-On Builder Cannot Build ZIP File.
The source file {source} cannot be loaded. Make sure that the file exists at the given path.
Build the add-on from these directories
Specify the build path (relative to your XenForo root). Please include the trailing slash

Click on of the installed add-ons below to build. Specify the build location, and the names of your library, js and styles folders. Once the build is complete you will find a copy of your files plus a package of your add-on which is compatible with the add-on installer and containing the add-on XML file.
Confirm deletion of content type field
Content type field value must be a valid class that already exists.
Please enter a valid field name.
Please enter a valid field value.
Could not copy the add-on files to the build directory. Did you specify the correct source directory?
Specify additional file/files that should be included in the package.
Can't find directory of the addon. </br> It is supposed to be '/library/{dirName}' or '/library/XXX/{dirName}'. </br> You may copy the files to the supposed dir to make it work.
With this option enabled, templates will be written to the file system and this directory will be monitored for changes before page load.
Please confirm that you want to delete the following content type
Please confirm that you want to delete the following content type field
The requested content type could not be found.
The requested content type field could not be found.
A valid and installable XML file not found.
Please check you have entered your XenForo Customer Area (not XenForo Community) username, password and license key correctly.
Please confirm that you wish to upgrade to the following version
Debug: Off      Add-on: Off
Debug: Off      Add-on: {addon}
Debug: On      Add-on: Off
Debug: On      Add-on: {addon}
Enter a JSON encoded string to decode
You already have the latest version of XenForo installed.
Please enter all details including the username, password and license key.
Only returns rows affected. Use fetch options to view returned data.
Note: Some values may not update immediately.
Upgrade to the latest "Unsupported" release (if available).
Please verify the query you have entered is valid.
